verses.text: \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w lay|strong="H1121"\w* \w up|strong="H6845"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* precepts \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thee. \w Son|strong="H1121"\w*,

\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* thou shalt \w live|strong="H2421"\w*: \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* as \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w apple|strong="H0380"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* thy \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*:

\w Bind|strong="H7194"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w fingers|strong="H0676"\w*, \w write|strong="H3789"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* tables \w of|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*: Thou art \w my|strong="H0559"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*: \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* prudence thy \w friend|strong="H4129"\w*,

That she may \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thee \w from|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* that \w is|strong="H0802"\w* not thine, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w from|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w* \w who|strong="H8104"\w* sweeteneth \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w look|strong="H8259"\w* \w out|strong="H8259"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w window|strong="H2474"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w through|strong="H1157"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w lattice|strong="H0822"\w*,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* little \w ones|strong="H1121"\w*, \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* foolish \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w*,

Who passeth \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w street|strong="H1870"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w corner|strong="H6438"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* goeth nigh \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H1870"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w dark|strong="H5399"\w*, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H3915"\w* grows late, \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w darkness|strong="H0653"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* obscurity \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0802"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w a|strong="H0802"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* meeteth \w him|strong="H7125"\w* \w in|strong="H0802"\w* \w harlotâ€™s|strong="H2181"\w* attire prepared \w to|strong="H3820"\w* deceive souls; talkative \w and|strong="H0802"\w* wandering,

\w Not|strong="H3808"\w* bearing \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* quiet, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* able \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w abide|strong="H7931"\w* still \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*,

\w Now|strong="H6471"\w* \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w*, \w now|strong="H6471"\w* \w in|strong="H0693"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*, \w now|strong="H6471"\w* \w lying|strong="H0693"\w* \w in|strong="H0693"\w* \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* \w near|strong="H0681"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w corners|strong="H6438"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* catching \w the|strong="H0559"\w* young man, \w she|strong="H6440"\w* kisseth \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* impudent \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, flattereth, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w vowed|strong="H5088"\w* victims \w for|strong="H5921"\w* prosperity, \w this|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* paid \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* am \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w meet|strong="H6440"\w* thee, desirous \w to|strong="H5921"\w* see thee, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* thee.

\w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w have|strong="H4714"\w* woven \w my|strong="H7234"\w* \w bed|strong="H6210"\w* \w with|strong="H4714"\w* cords, \w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w have|strong="H4714"\w* covered it \w with|strong="H4714"\w* painted tapestry, brought \w from|strong="H4714"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

I have perfumed \w my|strong="H5130"\w* \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* \w with|strong="H4904"\w* \w myrrh|strong="H4753"\w*, \w aloes|strong="H0174"\w*, \w and|strong="H4753"\w* \w cinnamon|strong="H7076"\w*.

Come, let us be inebriated \w with|strong="H7301"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* breasts, \w and|strong="H1242"\w* let us \w enjoy|strong="H5965"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* desired embraces, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w day|strong="H1242"\w* appear.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w very|strong="H1980"\w* \w long|strong="H7350"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w bag|strong="H6872"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*: \w he|strong="H3117"\w* mill \w return|strong="H0935"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w full|strong="H3117"\w* \w moon|strong="H3677"\w*.

\w She|strong="H3948"\w* entangled \w him|strong="H5186"\w* \w with|strong="H5186"\w* \w many|strong="H7230"\w* \w words|strong="H8193"\w*, \w and|strong="H5080"\w* drew \w him|strong="H5186"\w* \w away|strong="H5186"\w* \w with|strong="H5186"\w* \w the|strong="H5186"\w* flattery \w of|strong="H7230"\w* \w her|strong="H5186"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.

\w Immediately|strong="H6597"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* followeth \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w an|strong="H0935"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \w led|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* be \w a|strong="H0935"\w* victim, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* lamb playing \w the|strong="H0413"\w* wanton, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* not knowing \w that|strong="H0310"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w is|strong="H0191"\w* drawn \w like|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w fool|strong="H0191"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* bonds,

\w Till|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w arrow|strong="H2671"\w* pierce \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w liver|strong="H3516"\w*: \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w haste|strong="H4116"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w snare|strong="H6341"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* knoweth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* danger.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* attend \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* thy \w mind|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* drawn \w away|strong="H8582"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*: \w neither|strong="H0408"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* thou \w deceived|strong="H8582"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w paths|strong="H5410"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w wounded|strong="H2491"\w*, \w and|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* strongest \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w Her|strong="H0413"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* hell, reaching even \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w inner|strong="H2315"\w* \w chambers|strong="H2315"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.
